name: The 5th International Symposium on Fundamental and Applied Sciences
content: Dear Sir/Madam Greeting from The 5th International Symposium on Fundamental and Applied Sciences (2017 ISFAS) Please add the following information on your webpage for advertisement of conference. Name of conference: T The 5th International Symposium on Fundamental and Applied Sciences (2017 ISFAS) Date(s) of conference: March 29-31, 2017 Full location details: Nagoya, Japan Key dates (registration, abstract submission etc): Abstract/Paper Submission Deadline December 10th, 2016 Notification of Acceptance December 25th, 2016 Final Abstract/ Full Paper Submission Deadline January 15th, 2017 Registration Deadline January 15th, 2017 Conference Date March 29-31, 2017 Website link: http://isfas.org/ Contact details: isfas@isfas.org Organized by Higher Education Forum 12-1F.,No.129,Sec.1,Fuxing S.Rd.,Taipei,Taiwan http://www.prohef.org/ Tel:+886227401498 Fax:+886227522642
